title: Font used in BT Shop catalogue
content:
Any ideas?

The ampersand is distinguishable, but I can’t find the font. The G has no spur or bar, the uppercase Q tail crosses the circle, the U has no stem... it looks like so many sans faces, but it has a nice range of weights, prints well, and is quite economical on space.

Steve

author: buddhaboy

comments.content:
Ahhhh rats!!! It looks so nice as well... more sample attached, but I think you are right.. they have used their DM special :/

Oh well, back to the drawing board.
